'''"Fashion Show"''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Taiyaki]] with [[Chiori]]. The recipe for Taiyaki is obtainable from [[Kiminami Anna]] at [[Kiminami Restaurant]] for 5,000 [[Mora]].
